name: Frozen Sangria
description: This frozen sangria is tart and refreshing, even if it's masking pretty terrible wine. You could thin it with a little 7-Up, but we prefer it nearly spoonable. Try substituting frozen peaches or mangoes or a mixture of berries to change things up.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and garnish with an orange slice. Serve immediately.
